android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.description: Allows an application to disable the key lock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of this is the phone disabling the key lock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enabling the key lock when the call is finished.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

playstore_details.title: Fake Santa Claus Video Calling Simulator
playstore_details.description:
Amaze or Surprise your children with a call from Santa Claus on this Christmas.

Ho Ho Hoo Santa is Get a Video call from Santa Claus and give happiness to childrens.

Select Santa Clause photo for incoming Caller Screen.
it's Simple to use open app select timer to get call back and just wait for your phone to ring.

contains fun for your kids to talk with pre-recorded Santa on the phone. Santa Claus Greeting app and find out what your kids want for this Christmas.

Feature Video Call from Santa Claus 
you can get a video call and voice call from Santa.
you can also schedule Santa Claus video call and voice call timer within the app.
Write a Real Letters to Santa and Santa Claus.

Santa Claus wishing you a Merry Christmas and giving best wishes for this year. Share Call Santa Simulator app to your friends & family and let them enjoy.

Recieve Fake video call from santa Claus and Make your children happy. Surprise your little ones with a call from Santa Claus. Who wouldn't
want to chat with the guy from north pole is Mr Santa Claus himself.  wonderful Christmas season.

Disclaimer
Santa will never be calling you. "Fake Santa Claus Greeting" application is only made for fun. It will not connect with Santa Claus. In fact I don't have the phone number of real Santa. This app is developed to entertain your children only and they really enjoy this app. this app does not bear any harm and is only for fun.
playstore_details.summary: Entertain your children with personlised video/audio call from Fake Santa Claus
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Entertain your children with personlised video/audio call from Fake Santa Claus
